tit.e: Kasa-toge Pass (a pass separating Kita Ward and Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City)
Kasa-toge Pass (a pass separating Kita Ward and Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City)

sen.j: 笠峠（かさとうげ）は京都府京都市北区 (京都市)と同市右京区を隔てる峠である。
sen.e: Kasa Pass ("Kasa Toge" in Japanese) separates Kita Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture and Ukyo Ward.
Kasa-toge Pass is a pass separating Kita Ward and Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kasa-toge Pass is a pass separating Kita Ward and Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 標高447mの国道162号の旧道上に位置する峠である。
sen.e: Kasa Pass is located on the original National Route 162 at a height of 447 meters.
It is located on the old National Route 162 at an altitude of 447 meters.
It is located on the old National Route 162 at an altitude of 447 meters.

sen.j: 平成の大合併により京都市と京北町が合併するまでは、両市町を隔てる峠としてその名が知られていた。
sen.e: The pass was known for separating Kyoto City and Keihoku-cho before they were merged during the mass mergers of the Heisei period.
The pass was known for separating Kyoto City and Keihoku Town before they were merged during the mass mergers of the Heisei period.
The pass was known for separating Kyoto City and Keihoku Town before they were merged during the mass mergers of the Heisei period.

sen.j: 周山街道の峠であるが、現在の周山街道は国道162号である。
sen.e: Kasa Pass is on the Shuzan-kaido Road, which became present day National Route 162.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Kasa-toge Pass is on the Shuzan-kaido Road, which became present day National Route 162.
Kasa-toge Pass is on the Shuzan-kaido Road, which became present day National Route 162.

sen.j: 国道162号では笠トンネルがこの峠直下を貫いている。
sen.e: Kasa Tunnel, on National Route 162, runs directly under the pass.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Kasa Tunnel, on National Route 162, runs directly under the pass.
Kasa Tunnel, on National Route 162, runs directly under the pass.

sen.j: この旧道は2009年現在ゲートによって固く閉ざされており、廃道となっている。
sen.e: As of 2009 this old road was closed with a gate and abandoned.
As of 2009 this old road was closed with a gate and abandoned.
As of 2009 this old road was closed with a gate and abandoned.

sen.j: その為、道路地図ではこの笠トンネルがトンネル峠として記載されているものが多い。
sen.e: Therefore many road maps describe Kasa Tunnel as a pass with a tunnel.
Therefore many road maps describe Kasa Tunnel as a pass with a tunnel.
Therefore many road maps describe Kasa Tunnel as a pass with a tunnel.

sen.j: 旧道は舗装されており、峠付近まで車両で走行することも可能だ。
sen.e: The old road is paved and it is possible to drive up to the pass by car.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The old road is paved and it is possible to drive up to the pass by vehicles.
The old road is paved and it is possible to drive up to the pass by vehicles.

sen.j: しかし、京都市側から登ると峠付近でゲートによって封鎖されている。
sen.e: Climbing up from Kyoto City side however, the road to the pass is closed with a gate.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Climbing up from Kyoto City side, however, the road around the pass is closed with a gate.
Climbing up from Kyoto City side, however, the road around the pass is closed with a gate.

sen.j: 京北町側では現国道からの分岐直後にゲートで封鎖されており通過は不可能である。
sen.e: On the Keihoku-cho side the road is closed with a gate immediately after it branches off from the current national route so it is not possible to drive through.
On the Keihoku Town side the road is closed with a gate immediately after it branches off from the current national route so it is not possible to drive through.
On the Keihoku Town side the road is closed with a gate immediately after it branches off from the current national route so it is not possible to drive through.

sen.j: 京都市側からなら峠地蔵まで行くことができる。
sen.e: It is possible to go as far as Toge-jizo (a Jizo statue at the pass) from Kyoto City side.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It is possible to go as far as Toge-jizo (a Jizo statue at the pass) from Kyoto City side.
It is possible to go as far as Toge-jizo (a Jizo statue at the pass) from Kyoto City side.

sen.j: しかし、私道となっている為フェンスで隔てられており、地蔵の近くまで行くことはできない。
sen.e: However as the road is private and fenced off it is not possible to reach the Jizo statue.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: However as the road is private and fenced off it is not possible to reach the Jizo statue.
However as the road is private and fenced off it is not possible to reach the Jizo statue.

sen.j: また現国道162号のトンネル峠は笠トンネルの項を参照。
sen.e: Also see the section on Kasa Tunnel regarding passes with a tunnel on National Route 162.
Also refer the article of Kasa Tunnel regarding pass with a tunnel on current National Route 162.
Also refer the article of Kasa Tunnel regarding pass with a tunnel on current National Route 162.

sen.j: 御経坂峠（京都市右京区）
sen.e: Mikyozaka Pass (Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City)
Mikyozaka-toge Pass (Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City)
Mikyozaka-toge Pass (Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City)
Kurio Pass (Ukyo Ward, Kyoto)
Kurio-toge Pass (Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City)
Kurio-toge Pass (Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City)
